metadata.Title: CVE-2017-12676 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: In ImageMagick 7.0.6-3, a memory leak vulnerability was found in the function ReadOneJNGImage in coders/png.c, which allows attackers to cause a denial of service.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> 0123-memory-leak-in-ReadOneJNGImage-618.patch in unstable 0288-CVE-2017-12676-Fix-memory-leak-in-ReadOneJNGImage.patch in wheezy not fixing memory leak in trusty and xenial

criterions.comment: imagemagick: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
